long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page Copilot is an innovative Chrome Extension that transforms your browsing experience by enabling interactive conversations with any webpage you visit. Utilizing advanced AI technology, this extension acts as your personal webpage assistant, offering insightful and concise summaries, key points, and relevant information from the content you're viewing.

Why Choose Page Copilot?

Saves Time: Quickly digest long articles and complex information.
Enhances Learning: Easily identify key points and new insights.
Interactive Experience: Engage with web content in a conversational manner.
